GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.15.78
GSD.description:
net: tun: fix bugs for oversize packet when napi frags enabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit dcc79cf735b8ec4bedaa82c53bed8c62721c042b, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 90e33d45940793def6f773b2d528e9f3c84ffdc7. For more details please see the references link.
